text:
Seeking commission-only sales agent to sell high-quality on-site IT training
We deliver world-wide. Our model achieves real learning: small class sizes, expert instructors, excellent materials, and lots of practical, hands-on lab exercises that leave the students really knowing their material and being able to use it.
Customers say it's the best training they've ever had, from anybody, on anything.
I'm partnered with GitLab, Docker, and am a member of the AWS partner network.
Looking for an independent sales agent. Progressive commission structure (the more you sell, the more you make!)
Remote and part-time OK.
Email me at: aleksey@verticalsysadmin.com
